name: Square ninja
description:
This was a game made for the blackthornpod game jam 3

The theme "Less is more" instantly made me think of speedrunning, as you want to get less time because less time is worth more

Use WASD and arrow keys back and forth to move the most quickly

Sound effects from SFXR

I made the game useing Godot game engene 

The music I made useing beepbox

I made the art

The font is the built-in font for Godot

I had alot of fun makeing this game for my first game jam, even if the game isn't that innovative

Best times:

Level 1: Toaster-on-mass: 00:01:10

Level 2: Toaster-on-mass: 00:01:15

Level 3: Toaster-on-mass: 00:06:09

Level 4: Toaster-on-mass: 00:01:07

Level 5: Toaster-on-mass: 00:02:42

Level 6: Toaster-on-mass: 00:01:32

Level 7: Toaster-on-mass: 00:02:56

Level 8: Toaster-on-mass: 00:04:39

Level 9: Toaster-on-mass: 00:05:25

If you want to beat my times I would recomend the later levels, as they are not as optimised

Comment your times in the commets!
